message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $85?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still think we can work out a better price. Would it be possible to lower it to $82?
